News.headline: Daggers Player Live Commentry: Tranmere Rovers v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Daggers Player Live Commentry: Tranmere Rovers v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Daggers Player Tranmere Rovers v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: If you are unable to make it to this Saturday's away fixture against Tranmere Rovers, tune in to Daggers Player to join James Glass for live commentary and updates from Prenton Park
News.description:
Saturday is the first of a series of big games for the Daggers as the season begins its journey towards the end. With the Daggers set to face many of the top 6 away from home in the coming months it promises to be an exciting time for John Still and his men.

The Daggers player will be at all the crucial games starting with the trip to Prenton Park this Saturday as the we head North to face Tranmere, sat one point and one place above the Daggers. If you are not able to be there join James Glass for full match commentary. The team will be on the air at the usual start time of 2.40.

The pre match show will cover the team news, transfers and give the latest on the big stories affecting the club. Interviews from key players and other journalists will give you a full picture of what is going on in and around the club.

If you haven't already signed up to Daggers player click here.
